facts.text: I'm the 'true' clownfish! I look a lot like my cousin the Ocellaris, but my black bands are thicker and bolder.
I'm Nemo's species! The famous movie fish was actually a Percula clownfish from the Great Barrier Reef.
I live in a sea anemone! Its stinging tentacles don't hurt me because I have a special slimy coating on my skin.

profile.habitat: Coral reefs of Papua New Guinea and Great Barrier Reef
